publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2603# Mr Lloyd Quinan: Holyrood Project Goods and Services-That the Parliament considers that goods for the Holyrood Project should not be sourced from states currently failing to comply with any resolutions of the United Nations.

*S1M-2603# Mr Lloyd Quinan: Holyrood Project Goods and Services-That the Parliament considers that goods *or services* for the Holyrood Project should not be sourced from states currently failing to comply with any resolutions of the United Nations. Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram*, Brian Adam*
S1M-2603# Holyrood Project Goods and Services (lodged on 15 January 2002) Ms Sandra White*, Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-2603# Mr Lloyd Quinan: Holyrood Project Goods and Services-That the Parliament considers that goods or services for the Holyrood Project should not be sourced from states currently failing to comply with any resolutions of the United Nations. Supported by: Mr Adam Ingram, Brian Adam, Ms Sandra White, Tommy Sheridan, Robin Harper*, Ms Margo MacDonald*
S1M-2603# Holyrood Project Goods and Services (lodged on 15 January 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2603# Holyrood Project Goods and Services (lodged on 15 January 2002) Christine Grahame*
S1M-2603# Holyrood Project Goods and Services (lodged on 15 January 2002) Dr Winnie Ewing*
S1M-2603# Holyrood Project Goods and Services (lodged on 15 January 2002) Donald Gorrie*
